content: this legal text summarizes the progress of a legal case that took place in ghent on may 4th 2017 the case involves two parties referred to as s and c who are going through a divorce during the divorce proceedings a settlement agreement was reached but s is now seeking to have the settlement annulled s argues that c took advantage of their vulnerable state during the negotiation and imposed an unfair agreement the court of first instance rejected ss claim but s has appealed the decision s is requesting the appointment of a different notaryliquidator to oversee the division of their joint property the court of appeal will now review the case and make a decision
